participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, I often find joy in nurturing my family and pursuing artistic endeavors.
participant_1.background: I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike. My favorite thing to do is research race cars in my free time. I've recently started working as a freelance designer. I enjoy spending time organizing my space and making sure everything is in its place. I'm afraid of disappointing my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, I thrive on spontaneity and love to explore new places and experiences.
participant_2.background: I enjoy having the freedom to wear whatever I want to work, as long as it's not too revealing. I make over 200,000 per year. I like to travel and I'm comfortable in my boots. I love to eat meat. I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.

content.text: Not much, just got home from work.
Oh cool! What kind of stuff do you design?
I do a lot of different things, but mostly logos and websites.
That's awesome! I'm a stay at home mom, but I used to be a graphic designer.
Oh really? What did you like about it?
I loved the creative process, and I loved being able to see my work come to life.
That's great! What made you stop?
I had a baby, and it just wasn't feasible to keep working full time.
I totally get that. I love my job, but I love my family more.
Same here! So what do you like to do in your free time?
I love to travel, I love to eat meat, and I love to go shopping.
Me too! I love to travel, I love to eat, and I love to shop!
We should go on a trip together sometime!
